name: R-Ian -- Gift Jam 2017
description:
This Game was made for the 2017 Gift Jam.

OO boy, my first time uploading a game.

In this game, you control a robot by the name of R-Ian to deliver C Balls to the end of the machine. The game is simple, and has little challenge, but i made it to show my thanks for my C# teacher: Ryan, who is the same age as me. Ryan, thank you for teaching me about coding, though this game can hardly be called fun, it just shows how much i have learnt from you. I understand there is much more to this, but all in all, thank you for getting me into game development, life wouldn't be the same. :D

thanks for playing!!!
